name: Driver's License Number
description: This field contains the driver’s license information.  For state or province refer to official postal codes for that country; for country refer to ISO 3166 for codes

fields.name: Driver s License Number
fields.description: This field contains the driver’s license number

fields.name: Issuing State, Province, Country
fields.description: Issuing authority for driver’s license.  For state or province refer to official postal codes for that country; for country refer to ISO 3166 for codes.  Refer to user-defined table 0333 - Driver’s license issuing authority
